content:
# I have successfully gathered 10 copper ore. Now, I need to smelt this copper ore into copper plates before I can craft electronic circuits.

# I will insert the copper ore into the stone furnace for smelting. 
# Since the furnace is already operational, I will add the copper ore to it.

insert_item(Prototype.CopperOre, furnace, quantity=10)  # Insert 10 copper ore into the furnace.
print(f"Inventory after inserting copper ore into the furnace: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Check inventory again.

# Now, I will wait for the furnace to smelt the copper ore into copper plates.
for _ in range(30):  # Wait for a maximum of 30 seconds for smelting.
    copper_plate_status = inspect_inventory(furnace)[Prototype.CopperPlate]  # Check how many copper plates have been produced.
    if copper_plate_status > 0:  # We expect to produce at least one copper plate.
        break
    sleep(1)
else:
    raise Exception("Smelting timeout - check fuel and inputs")  # If it times out, raise an exception.

# Check the total number of copper plates produced.
print(f"Copper plates produced: {inspect_inventory(furnace)[Prototype.CopperPlate]}")  # Display the number of copper plates created.
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Print current entities on the map.
